From precision screwdrivers to hard hitting hammers, Kobalt hand tools are crafted for long-lasting performance. Built to withstand everyday use of a professional yet affordable enough for the weekend warrior, our hand tools have been carefully designed to improve user productivity.

The foundation of Kobalt tools started back in 1998. At that time, Lowe’s wanted to have its own brand of tools to sell. Today, Kobalt continues to be a tools brand focused on the needs of home and DIY users.
Kobalt provides reliable, high-quality tools and outdoor power equipment perfect for tackling the most difficult DIY projects year-round.
